item.title: Veda Revelation per Bhartr-hari
item.description: Veda Revelation according to Bhartr-hari Intro In the present paper,* I approach Veda revelation principally as a phenomenon or experience, more for the logic of its assumption and conception than for the details of what it reveals. The paper thus supplements Aklujkar 199la summarized in appendix 1 with some changes. A very short version of this paper was presented on 30 March 1992 at the 202nd meeting of the American Oriental Society held at Cambridge, Massachusetts.
